mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MNGCOST_MAIN_CTG ORDER BY MNGCOST_M_CTG_NO
SELECT * FROM MNGCOST_SUB_CTG WHERE MNGCOST_M_CTG_NO=#{mngcostMCtgNo} ORDER BY MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MNGCOST_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND TO_CHAR(MNGCOST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM') =TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{mngcostClaimdate}, -1), 'YYYY-MM') UNION SELECT 0, 39, #{aptNo}, TO_CHAR(U_COST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM')||'월 세대 전기료', U_COST_PRICE, U_COST_USEDATE FROM UTILITY_COST_INFO WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE=#{householdCode} AND U_CTG_NO=3 AND TO_CHAR(U_COST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM') =TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{mngcostClaimdate}, -1), 'YYYY-MM') )
WHERE MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO=#{mngcostSCtgNo}
WHERE MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO IN (SELECT MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO FROM MNGCOST_SUB_CTG WHERE MNGCOST_M_CTG_NO=#{mngcostMCtgNo})
ORDER BY MNGCOST_USEDATE DESC

SELECT ADD_NAME, ADD_PRICE FROM ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO WHERE ADD_NO IN (SELECT ADD_NO FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE=#{householdCode} AND ADD_OUTDATE IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(ADD_OUTDATE, 'YYYY-MM') > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{mngcostClaimdate}, -2), 'YYYY-MM'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT MNGCOST_CLAIMDATE FROM MNGCOST_PAYMENT_LIST WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE IN (SELECT HOUSEHOLD_CODE FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT') ) WHERE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(MNGCOST_CLAIMDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') =#{startdate}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MNGCOST_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MNGCOST_INFO (MNGCOST_NO, MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO, APT_NO, MNGCOST_CONTENT, MNGCOST_PRICE) VALUES(#{mngcostNo}, #{mngcostSCtgNo}, #{aptNo}, #{mngcostContent}, #{mngcostPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT MNGCOST_NO, MNGCOST_M_CTG_NO, I.MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO, MNGCOST_CONTENT, MNGCOST_PRICE, MNGCOST_USEDATE FROM MNGCOST_INFO I JOIN MNGCOST_SUB_CTG S ON I.MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO = S.MNGCOST_S_CTG_NO WHERE MNGCOST_NO=#{mngcostNo}

SELECT I.YM, TO_CHAR(I.TPRICE, '999,999,999,999,999')||'원' TPRICE, NVL(COMPLETE, '청구대기') ISORDER FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(MNGCOST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM') YM, SUM(MNGCOST_PRICE) TPRICE FROM MNGCOST_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(MNGCOST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM') )I LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(MNGCOST_CLAIMDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') YM, (CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN '청구완료' END) COMPLETE FROM MNGCOST_PAYMENT_LIST WHERE HOUSEHOLD_CODE IN (SELECT HOUSEHOLD_CODE FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(MNGCOST_CLAIMDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM')) P ON I.YM = P.YM ORDER BY I.YM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MNGCOST_PAYMENT_LIST (MNGCOST_LIST_NO, HOUSEHOLD_CODE, MNGCOST_TOTAL_PRICE, MNGCOST_LIMITDATE, MNGCOST_CLAIMDATE) SELECT MNGCOST_PAYMENT_LIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, M.HOUSEHOLD_CODE, CEIL(APRICE+UPRICE +(SELECT SUM(MNGCOST_PRICE) FROM MNGCOST_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND TO_CHAR(MNGCOST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM')=#{startdate}) /(SELECT TOTAL_HOUSEHOLD FROM APARTMENT_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo})), #{mngcostLimitdate}, #{mngcostClaimdate} FROM ( SELECT H.HOUSEHOLD_CODE, APT_NO, NVL(TOTAL, 0) APRICE, NVL(U_COST_PRICE, 0) UPRICE FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO H LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOUSEHOLD_CODE, SUM(ADD_PRICE) TOTAL FROM ADD_ORDER_LIST L JOIN ADDITIONAL_FACILITY_INFO I ON L.ADD_NO = I.ADD_NO GROUP BY HOUSEHOLD_CODE)A ON H.HOUSEHOLD_CODE=A.HOUSEHOLD_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOUSEHOLD_CODE, U_COST_PRICE FROM UTILITY_COST_INFO WHERE U_CTG_NO=3 AND TO_CHAR(U_COST_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM')=#{startdate})U ON H.HOUSEHOLD_CODE=U.HOUSEHOLD_CODE WHERE AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT' )M
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DONG FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT' ORDER BY DONG DESC
SELECT DISTINCT HO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE APT_NO=#{aptNo} AND AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT' ORDER BY HO DESC
SELECT HOUSEHOLD_CODE, DONG, HO FROM HOUSEHOLD_INFO WHERE AUTH_CODE='RESIDENT' AND APT_NO=#{aptNo} ORDER BY DONG, HO
